data.title: Legendary Director Alejandro Jodorowsky Quietly Releases New Ambient EP
data.meta_description: Filmmaker Alejandro Jodorowsky quietly released a new ambient EP this month. "Ambient Moods 1" consists of 6 tracks and was released via ABKCO Music & Records.
data.meta_site_name: The Bomarr Blog - An old-fashioned blog dedicated to music/art/all things creative.
